```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(gridExtra)
```

Cargamos los datos
```{r}
df <- read.csv("Data/BD.csv", header = TRUE)

# Asignación de variables
Poblacion <- DF$Pob 
Superficie <- DF$km2
Sol.desempleo <- DF$Sol_des
```


Comparaciones del índice
```{r}
# indice de vulnerabilidad
indice <- c(4.2369847,3.1202693,3.7918290,8.8090276,4.0816771,1.0867166,14.6877406,10.3079868,14.8863182,17.3828798,0.9210095,24.6801129,18.2513107,8.7275107,7.7044839,15.3095190)

# casos confirmados al 19/05/20
Casos <- c(2656, 2007, 1911, 2569, 755, 2376, 5157, 2237, 7361,
           1394, 1665, 981, 2065, 3061, 2174, 2507)

D <- Sol.desempleo
D2 <- Sol.desempleo/Poblacion
D3 <- Sol.desempleo/Superficie

par(mar = c(5,5,2,5))
plot(indice, col = "blue", main = "Índice vs Desempleo %", xlab = "Delegaciones 1 a 16", ylab = "índice", type = "b")
par(new = T)
plot(D2, col = "red", axes=F, xlab=NA, ylab=NA, type = "b")
axis(side = 4)
mtext(side = 4, line = 3, 'Solicitudes Desempleo %',)
legend("topleft",legend=c("índice", "Solicitudes"), lty=c(0,0), pch=c(16, 16), col=c("blue", "red"))


par(mar = c(5,5,2,5))
plot(indice, col = "blue", main = "Índice vs Casos confirmados %", xlab = "Delegaciones 1 a 16", ylab = "índice", type = "b")
par(new = T)
plot(Casos/Poblacion, col = "red", axes=F, xlab=NA, ylab=NA, type = "b")
axis(side = 4)
mtext(side = 4, line = 3, 'Casos confirmados %')
legend("topleft",legend=c("índice", "Casos"), lty=c(0,0), pch=c(16, 16), col=c("blue", "red"))
```
